name: A Ruby Jewel Match: Free Gem 3 Matching Fun Brain Puzzle Games
name_original: A Ruby Jewel Match: Free Gem 3 Matching Fun Brain Puzzle Games
description:
Super fun matching action! Do you like match 3 puzzle games? Then this is perfect for you and it's completely FREE! Switch and match your way through all the addicting levels. The super ruby match challenge is now available on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch!

Ruby Jewel Match features:
~ Cool ruby graphics!
~ Easy and fun to play for all ages!
~ Tons of levels!
~ Game center leaderboards for High Score competitions!
~ Special power rubies to clear more jewels from the board
~ Relaxing music and much more!

Download it completely FREE today!
